error.message: Call to deprecated function db_query(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, get a database connection injected into your service from the container and call query() on it. For example,
Call to deprecated function format_date(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::service('date.formatter')->format().
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to who_bought_what.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
